ygData.subject: Re: New Patch message
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Here s another useful tip if you re going to try to use Chain to break root in dungeons.  Do not wear too many magic resist raising items.  I died twice in
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Sean Kennedy wrote:
> >From: Adam DeMarino <psycotix@...>
> >
> >Well I was fooling around, and I got rooted in a dungeon(selo's doesn't
> >work, but can still break root), and the selo's did not break the root.
> >I forgot to try chain, as I didn't have it memmed at the moment.
>
> Selo's hasn't broken root in a dungeon for a couple of weeks now
> that I know of. Kept trying in in Split Paw when Ren Rex would
> root me or a party mate.

Here's another useful tip if you're going to try to use Chain
to break root in dungeons. Do not wear too many magic resist
raising items. I died twice in Runnyeye tonight. Got rooted
both times, and I kept resisting my Chains. :-)

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
